Reference

All functions

CorpusData

Manage Corpus Data and Encode CWB Corpus.

as.vrt()

Consolidate vrt files for CWB import.

conll_get_regions()

Extract regions from NER annotations (CoNNL format).

corpus_install() corpus_packages() corpus_rename() corpus_remove() corpus_as_tarball() corpus_copy() corpus_recode() corpus_testload() corpus_get_version() corpus_reload()

Install and manage corpora.

cwb_install() cwb_get_url() cwb_get_bindir() cwb_is_installed()

Utilities to install the Corpus Workbench (CWB)

cwbtools-package cwbtools

cwbtools-package

cwb_corpus_dir() cwb_registry_dir() cwb_directories() create_cwb_directories() use_corpus_registry_envvar()

Manage directories for indexed corpora

encode()

Encode CWB Corpus.

get_encoding()

Get Encoding of Character Vector.

p_attribute_encode() p_attribute_recode() p_attribute_rename()

pkg_create_cwb_dirs() pkg_add_corpus() pkg_add_configure_scripts() pkg_add_description() pkg_add_creativecommons_license() pkg_add_gitattributes_file()

Create and manage packages with corpus data.

registry_file_parse() registry_file_compose() registry_data() registry_file_write() registry_set_property() registry_set_info() registry_set_name()

s_attribute_encode() s_attribute_recode() s_attribute_files() s_attribute_get_values() s_attribute_get_regions() s_attribute_merge() s_attribute_delete() s_attribute_rename()
